DOC.brief_summary: Most trauma survivor low-income country develop post-injury chronic pain syndrome . Normally traumatic amputee wait 4-6 month definitive prosthesis fitting . The actual study aim reduce post-injury chronic pain improve function immediate temporary prosthesis fitting surgery .
DOC.detailed_description: Background : Previous study document 75 % traumatic amputee low-income country develop incapacitate chronic pain syndrome . With present level rehabilitation service , amputees wait 4-6 month postoperative prosthesis fitting . Hypothesis : Immediate postoperative prosthesis fit reduce chronic pain improve function trans-tibial amputee . Reference population : Traumatic amputee live low-income low-resource community . Study population : Adult patient trans-tibial amputation rural district Battambang Province , Cambodia . Study design : A semi-cross control study . Supplement : longitudinal qualitative study subset . Main variable quantitative study : - Outcome indicator : Self-rated pain ( VAS ) . Self-rated function ( VAS ) . Pain ( clinical exam ) . Gait analysis . - Variables : Preinjury morbidity socioeconomical status . Injury severity ( RTS , ISS ) . Prehospital hospital analgesia . Postoperative infection . Amputation stump quality ( clinical rating ) . Sampling : Given test power =0.8 , significance level =0.05 , sequential analysis result , estimate 15 patient include study group . The sample may modify due sequential analysis ( see ) . Intervention : A mobile rural workshop take mold adapt temporary tuber-ischii bearing prosthesis make local material . The prosthesis fit time amputation wound closure ( 5 - 15 day post-injury ) , patient mobilize walk aid . Control group patient comprise transtibial amputee manage neighbor hospital serve actual rehab workshop . Control patient leave hospital walking aid without prosthesis . Data gather rehab team ( surgeon prosthesis technician ) point zero , 1 month postoperation , 3 month postoperation . End-point evaluation 6 month post-op . Patients decide freely cross-over pain indication . Statistical analysis : Sequential design positive negative stopping rule . Outcome variables end-point report group 3 patient statistician ( Prof. Stig Larsen , University Oslo ) give stop order . Ethical consideration : If ITP prove favorable , study result use expand rural rehab service include control district well . This make use control group actual study legitimate . Also optional cross-over prevents inflict unnecessary discomfort study patient . The study approve local health authority Norwegian Committee Research Ethics . The system data file protection approve Norwegian Social Science Data Services , Bergen . Publication : Authorship set accord Vancouver regulation .
